entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlyoutPage and your IsPresented property Fail to Link #9055
  • Fix Native View Bounding Box are not empty tests for WinUI #9054
    .NET 7 Planning
  • iOS large titles behave incorrectly #9053
  • Method of a custom view gets callled before the constructor when an implicit style is used #9050
  • 'clang++ exited with code 1' iOS build issue #9047
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #9045
  • Delay the creation of the Flyout on FlyoutPage until after the app has started #9043
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Review the number of fragments created to renderer a Shell App #9042
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Shell navigation throws System.ArgumentException: 'Ambiguous routes matched for: ... error #9041
  • [iOS] Slider not redrawn after changing Maximum property at runtime #9040
  • Add comment to Colors.xaml about Android specific colors #9039
  • Custom FlyoutIcon visible although FlyoutBehavior set to disabled on Android an IOS #9037
  • Using `.Net Maui Community Toolkit` to change the `TintColor` at runtime. #9036

Closed

  • Window.Parent is null with Classic Navigation #8635
    6.0-servicing
  • Fix Shell tests on CI for iOS #8568
    6.0-servicing
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap@3fd875' #9007
  • [Android] DisplayAlert accept and cancel action color in light and dark theme #9005
  • Color button DisplayAlert box in dark theme on android not readable. #7601
  • Editor Sizing Options Do Not Work on Android #8313
  • Editor does not resize to full width in a ContentPage. #7810
  • [Android] Editor not displaying text correctly #9002
  • ScrollView Does Not Work When Inside A VerticalStackLayout #8990
  • Button.Shadow Win32 Exception (Win11) #7316
    6.0-sr3
  • CollectionView is incompatible on Shell tabbar pages on Android #8366
  • [Perf] compile most-used type converters #4293
  • Broken styles and margins in release mode #8712
  • Use Blazor Hybrid with own rendering/interaction pipeline #8993
  • Intent filter throws an exception in maui #8832
  • Cannot find Could not load signature of Xamarin.HotReload.Loader:CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve #6488
    6.0.300
  • Maui Blazor IOS platform opens script tag url in the browser #8741

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin net6 branch #9051
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions public #9038
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • [xamlc] add compiled StrokeShapeTypeConverter #8849
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Generate AOT Profilers for Non Shell based apps #8941
    .NET 7
  • Bump System.Memory from 4.5.4 to 4.5.5 #9025
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Detect installed workloads #9033
  • Bump Markdig from 0.22.1 to 0.23.0 #9026
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 900 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, 6.0-servicing
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • Fix RadioButton DefaultTemplate #8292
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
